info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 29 at 12:56PM CDT by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Gallatin County through 130 PM CDT... At 1256 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Shawneetown, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of central Gallatin County, including the following locations... Old Shawneetown and Junction. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
